name: Primitive Builder Simulator
description:
Your main rules are:
-need a fire - use a flint,
-want cut a tree - build an axe from a stone and a branch,
-need a shelter - collect materials like wood, clay and others,
-want an iron weapon - build a furnace.

Imagine that you don't have any modern technology. Use your mind to build from scratch your first primitive tools and constructions.
